com.example.jacob.mybrary

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.jacob.mybrary.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Dominic on 2015-11-04. This data management abstraction offers a simplified way of retrieving data. The data may either be remote or cached.
